stories.original_headline: Snowball Earth was not completely frozen, new study reveals
stories.original_summary: Even when Earth was locked in its most extreme deep freeze, the planet’s climate may not have been as silent and still as once believed. stories.fantasy_headline: Sages Uncover Warmth in the Age of Frozen Slumber!
stories.fantasy_story: Ancient runes found in the Northern Crags reveal a startling truth about the Age of Frozen Slumber. Even when the Great Realm seemed entirely encased in ice, pockets of life and warmth persisted. The Sages of the Scroll Tower now believe the world was not as still as once thought during this icy era.

stories.original_headline: Life may have started as sticky goo clinging to rocks
stories.original_summary: Life may have started in sticky, rock-hugging gels rather than inside cells. stories.fantasy_headline: Elder Alchemists Discover Life's Origins in Primal Ooze!
stories.fantasy_story: The Elder Alchemists of the Arcane College have unearthed a fascinating theory about the Spark of Life. They propose that life began as a sticky, magical ooze clinging to ancient stones. This primal gel likely trapped essential essences, providing a protected space for early enchantments to grow more complex.

stories.original_headline: This $7,999 robot will fold (some of) your laundry
stories.original_summary: If you have a spare $7,999 (plus a $250 deposit), hate folding laundry, and happen to live in the Bay Area, one-and-a-half-year-old startup Weave has the robot for you: Isaac 0. stories.fantasy_headline: Weave's Guild Unveils Golem for Tedious Garment Folding!
stories.fantasy_story: For those with ample gold coins and a dislike for folding garments, Weave's Guild of Enchanted Comforts offers a solution. Their new automaton, Isaac the Folder, can magically arrange your linens. This stationary Golem, while slow, promises to ease the burden of household chores for a tidy sum.

stories.original_summary: Business laptops are typically dull computers foisted on employees en masse. stories.fantasy_headline: A Masterful Scrying Slate for Guilds and Gamers Alike!
stories.fantasy_story: The Rune Scribes of Havenwood have crafted a remarkable new scrying slate, the ZBook Ultra G1a. While typically used by Guild Masters for their ledgers, this device holds secret enchantments for exciting games and illusions. It's a powerful artifact, blending serious work with delightful magical diversions.
